metadata.title: CVE-2024-0750 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A bug in popup notifications delay calculation could have made it possiblefor an attacker to trick a user into granting permissions. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird <115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
